t.p: Photos and videos of students or their work may be featured in materials to increase awareness of AISJ, engage the community, and/or recruit and train staff. This is done through print ads, online (AISJ website/official social media outlets/other), displays, brochures, banners, flyers, posters, and other types of media. Please select yes if you GRANT AISJ PERMISSION to use your child and their work in various materials and media, as outlined here, for the duration of their attendance at the school or for however long the material is being used, and if you release AISJ, its Board of Trustees, and its employees from all claims, demands, and liabilities in connection with the above. Please select no if you DO NOT GRANT AISJ PERMISSION for the same. Please note that a student's participation in any event/concert/production or other activity, that is publicized by AISJ, AUTOMATICALLY GRANTS AISJ permission to use that student's picture in all publicized material (social media, website, videos, ads...) for that particular event/activity.

div.label: Grant AISJ Photo Permission? *
Yes
No

div.p: The parent questionnaire will be looked at in conjunction with the contents of your child's academic records, the information provided will give additional insight into your child and a better picture of your child's academic abilities and needs. Please answer all questions as completely as you can. Please specify your child's strengths (1 being the lowest and 5 the highest)
